## StylableFC type

React FunctionComponent that takes an optional className prop.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare type StylableFC<P = {}> = FunctionComponent<P & {
    className?: string;
}>;
```

## Remarks

The className prop is used for styling the component instanceâ€™s top-level element (which should have `className={className}`<!-- -->) from the outside.
